problem_text_cn: 露露从纸上剪下一个圆形和一个扇形的纸片(如图),用它们恰好能围成一个圆锥模型,若圆的半径为1．扇形的圆心角等于120°,则此扇形的半径为()
problem_text_en: Lulu cuts a circle and a sector piece of paper from the paper (as shown in the picture), and uses them to form a cone model. If the radius of the circle is N_0. The central angle of the sector is equal to N_1, then the radius of the sector is ()
raw_answer: 解:扇形的弧长是2π．设扇形的半径是r,则\frac{120πr}{180}=2π,解得:r=3．故选:C．
